import axios from'./api';export const getTours=async()=>{const response=await axios.get('/tours');// ✅ Fixed
return response.data;};export const getTourById=async id=>{const response=await axios.get("/tours/".concat(id));// ✅ Fixed
return response.data;};export const searchTours=async(query,destination,minPrice,maxPrice)=>{const response=await axios.get('/tours/search',{params:{query,destination,minPrice,maxPrice}});// ✅ Fixed
return response.data;};export const submitFeedback=async feedbackData=>{const response=await axios.post('/feedback',feedbackData);// ✅ Fixed
return response.data;};
